name: L&T Items To Be Delivered
query:
select 
 `tabSales Order`.`name` as "Sales Order:Link/Sales Order:120",
 `tabSales Order`.`po_no` as "Customer Po.No:200",
 `tabSales Order`.`po_date` as "Customer Po.Date:Date",
 `tabSales Order`.`customer` as "Customer:Link/Customer:120",
 `tabSales Order`.`transaction_date` as "Date:Date",
 `tabSales Order Item`.item_code as "Item:Link/Item:120",
 `tabSales Order Item`.description as "Description::200",
 `tabSales Order Item`.qty as "Qty:Float:140",
 (select sum(`tabSales Invoice Item`.qty) from `tabSales Invoice Item` join `tabSales Invoice` on `tabSales Invoice Item`.parent = `tabSales Invoice`.name where `tabSales Invoice`.sales_order_reference_no = `tabSales Order`.name and `tabSales Invoice`.docstatus=1 AND `tabSales Invoice Item`.item_code = `tabSales Order Item`.item_code and `tabSales Invoice Item`.item_name = `tabSales Order Item`.item_name and `tabSales Invoice Item`.so_detail = `tabSales Order Item`.name) as "Delivered Qty:Float:140",
(`tabSales Order Item`.qty - ifnull((select sum(`tabSales Invoice Item`.qty) from `tabSales Invoice Item` join `tabSales Invoice` on `tabSales Invoice Item`.parent = `tabSales Invoice`.name where `tabSales Invoice`.sales_order_reference_no = `tabSales Order`.name and `tabSales Invoice`.docstatus=1 AND `tabSales Invoice Item`.item_code = `tabSales Order Item`.item_code and `tabSales Invoice Item`.item_name = `tabSales Order Item`.item_name and `tabSales Invoice Item`.so_detail = `tabSales Order Item`.name), 0)) as "Qty to Deliver:Float:140",
 `tabSales Order Item`.base_rate as "Rate:Float:140",
`tabSales Order Item`.gst_hsn_code as "HSN",
  (
SELECT CASE WHEN (
(
    SELECT SUM(tabBin.actual_qty) FROM tabBin WHERE tabBin.actual_qty <> 0 and tabBin.warehouse not LIKE "WC - DBTPL%%" and tabBin.warehouse in (select name from tabWarehouse WHERE tabWarehouse.parent_warehouse = "WAGHOLI BIN RACK - DBTPL") and tabBin.item_code = `tabSales Order Item`.item_code
) - (
        SELECT CASE WHEN SUM(rsi.reserve_qty) IS NULL THEN 0 WHEN SUM(rsi.reserve_qty) < 0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(rsi.reserve_qty) END
        FROM `tabReservation Schedule Item` as rsi
        JOIN  `tabReservation Schedule` as rs
        ON rsi.parent = rs.name
        WHERE rsi.item_code = `tabSales Order Item`.item_code
        AND rs.parent_warehouse = "WAGHOLI BIN RACK - DBTPL"
        AND rs.status = 'Open')
) < 0 THEN 0
ELSE (
(
    SELECT SUM(tabBin.actual_qty) FROM tabBin WHERE tabBin.actual_qty <> 0 and tabBin.warehouse not LIKE "WC - DBTPL%%" and tabBin.warehouse in (select name from tabWarehouse WHERE tabWarehouse.parent_warehouse = "WAGHOLI BIN RACK - DBTPL") and tabBin.item_code = `tabSales Order Item`.item_code
) - (
        SELECT CASE WHEN SUM(rsi.reserve_qty) IS NULL THEN 0 WHEN SUM(rsi.reserve_qty) < 0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(rsi.reserve_qty) END
        FROM `tabReservation Schedule Item` as rsi
        JOIN  `tabReservation Schedule` as rs
        ON rsi.parent = rs.name
        WHERE rsi.item_code = `tabSales Order Item`.item_code
        AND rs.parent_warehouse = "WAGHOLI BIN RACK - DBTPL"
        AND rs.status = 'Open'))END) as "Wagholi Stock:Float:140",


(
SELECT CASE WHEN (
    (
        SELECT SUM(tabBin.actual_qty) FROM tabBin WHERE tabBin.actual_qty <> 0 and tabBin.warehouse in (select name from tabWarehouse WHERE tabWarehouse.parent_warehouse = "PUNE BIN RACK - DBTPL") and tabBin.item_code = `tabSales Order Item`.item_code
    ) - (
        SELECT CASE WHEN SUM(rsi.reserve_qty) IS NULL THEN 0  WHEN SUM(rsi.reserve_qty) < 0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(rsi.reserve_qty) END
        FROM `tabReservation Schedule Item` as rsi 
        JOIN `tabReservation Schedule` as rs 
        ON rsi.parent = rs.name
        WHERE rsi.item_code = `tabSales Order Item`.item_code
        AND rs.parent_warehouse = "PUNE BIN RACK - DBTPL"
        AND rs.status = 'Open')
) < 0 THEN 0
ELSE (
    (
        SELECT SUM(tabBin.actual_qty) FROM tabBin WHERE tabBin.actual_qty <> 0 and tabBin.warehouse in (select name from tabWarehouse WHERE tabWarehouse.parent_warehouse = "PUNE BIN RACK - DBTPL") and tabBin.item_code = `tabSales Order Item`.item_code
    ) - (
        SELECT CASE WHEN SUM(rsi.reserve_qty) IS NULL THEN 0  WHEN SUM(rsi.reserve_qty) < 0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(rsi.reserve_qty) END
        FROM `tabReservation Schedule Item` as rsi 
        JOIN `tabReservation Schedule` as rs 
        ON rsi.parent = rs.name
        WHERE rsi.item_code = `tabSales Order Item`.item_code
        AND rs.parent_warehouse = "PUNE BIN RACK - DBTPL"
        AND rs.status = 'Open'))END) as "Pune Stock:Float:140",
 
 
(
SELECT CASE WHEN (
    (
        SELECT SUM(tabBin.actual_qty) FROM tabBin WHERE tabBin.actual_qty <> 0 and tabBin.warehouse in (select name from tabWarehouse WHERE tabWarehouse.parent_warehouse = "PIMPRI BIN RACK - DBTPL" ) and tabBin.item_code = `tabSales Order Item`.item_code
    ) - (
        SELECT CASE WHEN SUM(rsi.reserve_qty) IS NULL THEN 0 WHEN SUM(rsi.reserve_qty) < 0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(rsi.reserve_qty) END
        FROM `tabReservation Schedule Item` as rsi
        JOIN `tabReservation Schedule` as rs 
        ON rsi.parent = rs.name
        WHERE rsi.item_code = `tabSales Order Item`.item_code
        AND rs.parent_warehouse = "PIMPRI BIN RACK - DBTPL"
        AND rs.status = 'Open')
) < 0 THEN 0
ELSE (
    (
        SELECT SUM(tabBin.actual_qty) FROM tabBin WHERE tabBin.actual_qty <> 0 and tabBin.warehouse in (select name from tabWarehouse WHERE tabWarehouse.parent_warehouse = "PIMPRI BIN RACK - DBTPL") and tabBin.item_code = `tabSales Order Item`.item_code
    ) - (
        SELECT CASE WHEN SUM(rsi.reserve_qty) IS NULL THEN 0 WHEN SUM(rsi.reserve_qty) < 0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(rsi.reserve_qty) END
        FROM `tabReservation Schedule Item` as rsi
        JOIN `tabReservation Schedule` as rs 
        ON rsi.parent = rs.name
        WHERE rsi.item_code = `tabSales Order Item`.item_code
        AND rs.parent_warehouse = "PIMPRI BIN RACK - DBTPL"
        AND rs.status = 'Open'))END) as "Pimpri Stock:Float:140",
 
 
(
SELECT CASE WHEN (
    (
        select SUM(tabBin.actual_qty) from tabBin WHERE tabBin.actual_qty <> 0 and tabBin.warehouse in (select name from tabWarehouse WHERE tabWarehouse.parent_warehouse = "MAHAPE BIN RACK - DBTPL") and tabBin.item_code = `tabSales Order Item`.item_code
    ) - (
        SELECT CASE WHEN SUM(rsi.reserve_qty) IS NULL THEN 0 WHEN SUM(rsi.reserve_qty) < 0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(rsi.reserve_qty) END
        FROM `tabReservation Schedule Item` as rsi
        JOIN `tabReservation Schedule` as rs 
        ON rsi.parent = rs.name
        WHERE rsi.item_code = `tabSales Order Item`.item_code
        AND rs.parent_warehouse = "MAHAPE BIN RACK - DBTPL"
        AND rs.status = 'Open')
) < 0 THEN 0
ELSE (
    (
        select SUM(tabBin.actual_qty) from tabBin WHERE tabBin.actual_qty <> 0 and tabBin.warehouse in (select name from tabWarehouse WHERE tabWarehouse.parent_warehouse = "MAHAPE BIN RACK - DBTPL") and tabBin.item_code = `tabSales Order Item`.item_code
    ) - (
        SELECT CASE WHEN SUM(rsi.reserve_qty) IS NULL THEN 0 WHEN SUM(rsi.reserve_qty) < 0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(rsi.reserve_qty) END
        FROM `tabReservation Schedule Item` as rsi
        JOIN `tabReservation Schedule` as rs 
        ON rsi.parent = rs.name
        WHERE rsi.item_code = `tabSales Order Item`.item_code
        AND rs.parent_warehouse = "MAHAPE BIN RACK - DBTPL"
        AND rs.status = 'Open'))END) as "Mahape Stock:Float:140",

 `tabSales Order Item`.item_group as "Item Group:Link/Item Group:120",
 `tabSales Order`._assign as "Assigned to::200"
 from `tabSales Order` JOIN `tabSales Order Item` on  `tabSales Order Item`.`parent` = `tabSales Order`.`name`
 JOIN `tabItem Group` on `tabItem Group`.name = `tabSales Order Item`.item_group 
 where (`tabItem Group`.parent_item_group like '%%L & T%%' or `tabItem Group`.name like '%%L & T%%') and `tabSales Order`.docstatus = 1 and `tabSales Order`.status not in ("Stopped", "Closed") and ifnull(`tabSales Order Item`.delivered_qty,0) < ifnull(`tabSales Order Item`.qty,0)

order by `tabSales Order`.transaction_date asc
